commands.title: HTML5 Basic Template
commands.body: {{Heading}}

commands.title: HTML5 with CSS and JS
commands.body: {{Heading}}
commands.description: HTML5 template with embedded CSS and JavaScript

commands.title: Responsive Meta Tags
commands.body:
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="description" content="{{Description}}">
<meta name="keywords" content="{{keywords}}">
<meta name="author" content="{{Author Name}}">
commands.description: Essential meta tags for responsive and SEO-friendly pages

commands.title: HTML Form Template
commands.body:
<form action="{{action url}}" method="POST">
    <label for="name">Name:</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>
    
    <label for="email">Email:</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>
    
    <label for="message">Message:</label>
    <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea>
    
    <button type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>
commands.description: Basic contact form structure with validation

commands.title: HTML Table Template
commands.description: Basic table structure with headers and body

commands.title: HTML Card Component
commands.body:
{{Card Title}}

{{Card Description}}

Learn More
commands.description: Card component with image, title, description and link

commands.title: Open Graph Meta Tags
commands.body:
<meta property="og:title" content="{{Title}}">
<meta property="og:description" content="{{Description}}">
<meta property="og:image" content="{{Image URL}}">
<meta property="og:url" content="{{Page URL}}">
<meta property="og:type" content="website">
commands.description: Open Graph tags for social media sharing

commands.title: Favicon Links
commands.body:
<link rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" href="/favicon.ico">
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="/favicon-32x32.png">
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="16x16" href="/favicon-16x16.png">
<link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="/apple-touch-icon.png">
commands.description: Favicon links for different devices and browsers

commands.title: External CSS and JS Links
commands.body:
<!-- CSS -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{{stylesheet url}}">

<!-- JavaScript -->
<script src="{{script url}}"></script>
<script src="{{script url}}" defer></script>
commands.description: Link external CSS and JavaScript files (defer loads after HTML parsing)
